title: China’s Xi Gains Power as Communist Party Designates Him Historical Figure
sub_head: Decision praises Xi’s ’great political courage’ and armors him against critics as he maneuvers to extend his rule
body:
Chinese leader Xi Jinping has formally etched his name alongside the greatest figures in the annals of Communist Party history, paving the way for him to dominate a major reshuffling of power in the coming year and extend his rule.
China’s most senior officials voted to approve a resolution on the party’s “major achievements and historical experiences” since its founding 100 years ago that portrays Mr. Xi as a core leader who has “promoted historic achievements and historic changes,” according to a communiqué published Thursday.
